content: the knit the inner layer of the fliptop seam then knit same on the left the palm half of the mitten knit another 7 7 8 9 11 rounds flip top seam divide the stitches in half for the top and palm of insert marker for new beginning of round k 6 7 the mitten and place on 2 separate holders 21 8 9 9 rounds even 24 27 30 32 sts each starting from the bor marker divide the stitches fingers in half for the palm and top of the hand the divide the stitches for the fingers and work the palm is where the flip top will open and the top is fingers the same as the right mitten where the seam will be note remember to mirror the right mitten place note the index finger closest to the thumb gusset make sure the opening is on the opposite side than on the right mitten thumb on the top half knit each stitch through both same as the right mitten front and back loops doubling their number 42 48 54 60 64 back sts flip top then k the palm half 21 24 27 30 32 sts pass bor marker same as the right mitten on the top of the mitten you will see stitches finishing which look like knit stitches alternating with ones that look like purl stitches using the tails of the yarn sew up any holes with the right side of the knitting facing you between the fingers weave in ends carefully slip the knit stitches onto a stitch holder held to the front and the purl stitches onto a knitting needle held to the back you now 6
